text: Chernihiv () is a city in Ukraine. About 300,000 people live there. ==Twin towns — Sister cities== Chirnihiv is twinned with: * Gomel, Belarus * Memmingen, Bavaria, Germany * Tarnobrzeg, Poland * Petah Tikva, Israel * Gabrovo, Bulgaria * Hradec Králové, Czech Republic * Ogre, Latvia * Prilep, North Macedonia == Gallery == 2014 Чернігів Україна Адміністративний будинок.jpg Чернігів.
